name: Terminal Garden (James Martini, VenusGames)
description:
In Terminal Garden take the role of the groundskeeper of a digital space reawakened to tend to the plants, objects, and people.

Help people solve their problems and ensure the world will continue to operate for years to come.

Credits

Narrative Design: Frank Huang
Level Design: Crona Xu
Art: Raynah Alleyne
Programming: James Martini, Crona Xu
Music: Frank Huang
SFX/Sound Design: Frank Huang, James Martini
